text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires discussing why the Northern Ireland Protocol proved practically unworkable immediately after Brexit by referencing at least three main factors, such as heavy customs infrastructure needs, unworkable mechanisms for sifting goods, political turmoil from the 'hard border in the Irish Sea,' or capacity issues in NI.
